synopsis.text:
Season ed heroes and budding students of U.A. High School eagerly anticipate the summer training camp following the thrilling conclusion of the final exams. Izuku Midoriya, along with his revered mentor All Might, receives an invitation from a mysterious individual to visit I-Island, a colossal artificial city that serves as a global hub for scientific advancements in Quirks and hero equipment. The island is hosting the prestigious I-Expo, an event showcasing the latest breakthroughs in Quirk research and hero gear.

During the expo, Midoriya crosses paths with Melissa, a young girl without a Quirk, reminding him of his own Quirkless past. The seemingly impenetrable security system of I-Island is suddenly compromised by a group of villains, who seize control and take everyone on the island hostage. A sinister plot with the potential to disrupt the entire hero society is set in motion, with the key to thwarting it lying in the hands of the Symbol of Peace, All Might.

As chaos unfolds, Midoriya, Melissa, and some of his classmates find themselves thrust into the fray, forced to rely on their wits and burgeoning abilities to save the day. With the stakes higher than ever, can Midoriya and his friends rise to the challenge and prevent the collapse of the hero society?
